#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int lps ( char *str)
{
    int n = strlen(str);
    int i,j;
    int dp[n][n];
    memset(dp,0,sizeof(dp));
    for ( i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        dp[i][i] = 1;
    }

    for ( int l = 2; l<=n;l++)
    {
        for ( i = 0 ; i <n-l+1;i++ )
        {
            int j = i+l-1;

            if ( str[i]==str[j])
            {
                dp[i][j] = 1+dp[i+1][j]+dp[i][j-1];

            }
            else
            {
                dp[i][j] = dp[i+1][j]+dp[i][j-1]-dp[i+1][j-1];
            }

        }

    }
        return dp[0][n-1];

}
int main()
{
        int t;
        cin>>t;
        while(t--){
            char str[1000];
            cin >> str ;
            cout << lps(str)<<endl;
        }

}
